[event]
# Teleport to Volcano1
type=event
location=31,25,1,5
activate=on_trigger
intermap=maps/volcano1.txt,1,16

[event]
# Forge
type=event
location=4,19,1,1
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
loot=198,fixed,1
repeat=false
requires_not_status=skelkey
tooltip=Anvil

[event]
# Teleport to VolcanoA
type=event
location=5,0,11,1
activate=on_trigger
intermap=maps/volcanoa.txt,5,30

number=1,1
